## AbstractPrivateKeyStore.importKey() method

imports key by alias


**Signature:**

```typescript
abstract importKey(args: {
        alias: string;
        key: string;
    }): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  args | { alias: string; key: string; } | key alias and hex representation |
